titles.title: CLEAR Act
To amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to require annual reports to Congress regarding the status of investigations of unfair or deceptive acts or practices in or affecting commerce.
Clarifying Legality and Enforcement Action Reasoning Act
CLEAR Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Clarifying Legality and Enforcement Action Reasoning Act or the CLEAR Act
This bill requires the Federal Trade Commission to annually publish a report with certain information about its investigations of unfair or deceptive practices, including the number and disposition of such investigations.
